title: Recapping Episode 6 of ‘Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty’
description:
Bill Simmons, Wosny Lambre, and Chris Ryan recap Episode 6 of HBO’s ‘Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty.’ They discuss what they like about the show so far, John C. Reilly’s portrayal of Dr. Jerry Buss, the authentic locker room talk, and more.
Hosts: Bill Simmons, Wosny Lambre, and Chris Ryan
Producer: Jessie Lopez
